title: Odisha govt provided subsidy of over Rs 154 cr to EV owners since FY'23: Minister
description: The Odisha government has provided Rs 154.27 crore in subsidies to electric vehicle owners since the 2022-23 financial year. The subsidy program, which began in September 2021, has led to a rise in EV sales. The state offers up to Rs 20,000 for two-wheelers and Rs 30,000 for three-wheelers.
